title: Creative & Tech-Savvy Virtual Assistant NEEDED (Part-Time, Big Growth Potential!)
job_overview:
Are you a multi-talented, detail-oriented VA who loves to wear many hats?
Do you thrive on creative tasks AND techy tweaks?
I’m looking for a right-hand support superstar to help me grow my holistic healing business to the next level.
This is a part-time role (~5 hours/week to start) — with BIG potential to grow as we build Upgrade to see actual infontum together.

What You’ll Be Doing:
- Editing course videos & meditation audios (basic to intermediate editing) - MAIN PRIORITY for now
- Social media content creation & scheduling (IG, FB, etc.)
- Email marketing support (Mailerlite)
- Website updates (WordPress & Elementor)
- Graphic design (Canva, slides, workbooks, PDFs, etc.)
- Miscellaneous admin tasks (e.g., scheduling Zoom calls, organizing Canva folders, online research)

Skills We’re Looking For:
- Video & audio editing experience
- Social media management
- Email marketing (setting up campaigns, segmenting lists)
- Website updates (comfortable with WordPress & Elementor)
- Graphic design (Canva is a must, Adobe is a plus)
- Strong organizational skills & love for detail

About You:
- You are resourceful and proactive — you don’t wait to be told every little step.
- You love learning new tools and can figure things out independently.
- You enjoy creative tasks but are also reliable with routine admin.
- You have excellent written English and good communication skills.

How to Apply (Read Carefully!)
To make sure you’ve read this full post and aren’t just copy-pasting — Please start your application with the words: "Aligned and Ready!"
Also, tell me in 2-3 sentences:
- What excites you most about this role?
- Which of the tasks listed above do you feel most confident in?
And share your portfolio (especially video/audio editing samples).

Perks:
- Flexible work hours (I'm based in Bali)
- Opportunity to grow your role and hours as the business expands
- Work in a heart-centered, creative environment

Ready to co-create magic together? Apply now!
